name: Meanwhile: An Interactive Comic Book
description: An experimental mind-reading helmet, a time machine, and a doomsday device that can annihilate the human race. Which one would you like to test out first? The classic choose-your-path comic book by Jason Shiga.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP SP2 Processor: 1GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: any Storage: 180 MB available space
